content.raw:
If I specify the IP with an `-a` option, as in `./node_modules/.bin/http-server -a cohrint -p 8080 http/client &`,  I get the following output:

    nick@cohrint:~/gzweb$ Msg Waiting for master
    Starting up http-server, serving http/client on: http://cohrint:8080
    Hit CTRL-C to stop the server
    Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
    Msg Publicized address: 128.138.157.94

It looks like the publicized address isn't changing. I still get access to the server at `http://128.138.157.94:8080` instead of at `http://cohrint:8080` (cohrint is simply the hostname).
content.html:
If I specify the IP with an -a option, as in ./node_modules/.bin/http-server -a cohrint -p 8080 http/client &, I get the following output:

nick@cohrint:~/gzweb$ Msg Waiting for master
Starting up http-server, serving http/client on: http://cohrint:8080
Hit CTRL-C to stop the server
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 128.138.157.94

It looks like the publicized address isn't changing. I still get access to the server at http://128.138.157.94:8080 instead of at http://cohrint:8080 (cohrint is simply the hostname).
